p:
Several case reports and two retrospective studies have looked into HBVr risk in patients treated with ustekinumab. In a single-center Taiwanese retrospective cohort,
96 11 chronic HBV and 3 resolved HBV infection patients with psoriasis received ustekinumab. HBVr was observed in two of the seven chronic HBV infection patients who did not receive antiviral prophylaxis; in both cases the HBVr was mild and only virological, without biochemical hepatitis. In a similar Asian study by Ting and colleagues of 54 psoriasis patients treated with ustekinumab,
97 the rate of HBVr was 17% for chronically infected patients and 1.5% for those with resolved infection.
